description: Identifies when DNS zone is modified or deleted. Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: DNS zone modified and deleted may be performed by a system administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
DNS zone modification from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: Azure DNS Zone Modified or Deleted
